intro: Enter the lab of logic and intuition—can you survive this mysterious quiz experiment?
description:
A quick true-or-false quiz about the world’s most fascinating scientific experiments!  
Did Galileo really drop objects from the Leaning Tower of Pisa?  
Did Newton discover gravity by watching an apple fall?  
Challenge what you think you know about science — facts and myths are mixed!  
Test your curiosity and learn fun trivia from physics, chemistry, and biology.
